Protocols/SearcherDelegate.html#/s:FP17I.name: searcher(_:didReceive:error:userInfo:)
Protocols/SearcherDelegate.html#/s:FP17I.abstract: Called when a response to a request has been received by a searcher.

Protocols/SearchProgressDelegate.html#/s.name: searchDidStart(_:)
Protocols/SearchProgressDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Fired when progress should start being reported.

Protocols/SearchProgressDelegate.html#/s.name: searchDidStop(_:)
Protocols/SearchProgressDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Fired when progress should stop being reported.

Protocols/Caller.html.name: Caller
Protocols/Caller.html.abstract: Abstract protocol for scheduling calls (blocks of code).

Enums/MatchLevel.html#/s:FO17InstantSear.name: full
Enums/MatchLevel.html#/s:FO17InstantSear.abstract: All the query terms were found in the attribute.

Enums/MatchLevel.html#/s:FO17InstantSear.name: partial
Enums/MatchLevel.html#/s:FO17InstantSear.abstract: Only some of the query terms were found in the attribute.

Enums/MatchLevel.html#/s:FO17InstantSear.name: none
Enums/MatchLevel.html#/s:FO17InstantSear.abstract: None of the query terms were found in the attribute.

Enums/MatchLevel.html.name: MatchLevel
Enums/MatchLevel.html.abstract: Match level of a highlight or snippet result.

Classes/SearchProgressController.html#/s.name: graceDelay
Classes/SearchProgressController.html#/s.abstract: Delay before which search requests are not reported. Default: 0, meaning requests are reported immediately.

Classes/SearchProgressController.html#/s.name: running
Classes/SearchProgressController.html#/s.abstract: Whether a search is currently advertised as running.

Classes/Throttler.html#/s:vC17InstantSea.name: fireInitialCall
Classes/Throttler.html#/s:vC17InstantSea.abstract: Whether to fire immediately the initial call in a series. Default = true.

Classes/Throttler.html#/s:FC17InstantSea.name: init(delay:)
Classes/Throttler.html#/s:FC17InstantSea.abstract: Init a throttler with a given delay.

Classes/Debouncer.html#/s:vC17InstantSea.name: delay
Classes/Debouncer.html#/s:vC17InstantSea.abstract: Amount of time by which calls will be delayed before being fired.

Classes/Debouncer.html#/s:FC17InstantSea.name: init(delay:)
Classes/Debouncer.html#/s:FC17InstantSea.abstract: Init a debouncer with a given delay.

Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: highlightAttrs
Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Visual attributes to apply to the highlights.

Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: preTag
Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Markup identifying the beginning of a highlight. Defaults to <em>.

Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: postTag
Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Markup identifying the end of a highlight. Defaults to </em>.

Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: caseSensitive
Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Whether the markup is case sensitive. Defaults to false.

Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:FC17InstantS.name: init(highlightAttrs:)
Classes/Highlighter.html#/s:FC17InstantS.abstract: Create a new highlighter with the specified text attributes for highlights.

Classes/Highlighter.html.name: Highlighter
Classes/Highlighter.html.abstract: Renders marked up text into attributed strings with markup removed and the visual attributes applied to highlights.

Classes/Debouncer.html.name: Debouncer
Classes/Debouncer.html.abstract: Merges multiple calls into a single one.

Classes/Throttler.html.name: Throttler
Classes/Throttler.html.abstract: Ensures a maximum throughput on a stream of calls.

Classes/ResponseTimeStats/RequestStat.ht.name: stopDate
Classes/ResponseTimeStats/RequestStat.ht.abstract: The request’s stop date, or nil if the request is still running.

Classes/ResponseTimeStats/RequestStat.ht.name: completed
Classes/ResponseTimeStats/RequestStat.ht.abstract: Whether the request has completed, i.e. returned a response.

Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:vC17In.name: amnesiaDelay
Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:vC17In.abstract: Requests older than this delay will be discarded from the statistics. Default = 20 seconds.

Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:vC17In.name: maxRequestsInHistory
Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:vC17In.abstract: Maximum number of requests that will be considered for the statistics. Always the N most recent ones are used.

Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:FC17In.name: init(searcher:)
Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:FC17In.abstract: Construct new statistics, observing the specified searcher.

Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:FC17In.name: addSearcher(_:)
Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:FC17In.abstract: Add a new searcher to these statistics.

Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:ZvC17I.name: UpdateNotification
Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html#/s:ZvC17I.abstract: Notification posted when the statistics have been updated.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy/Mode.htm.name: Realtime
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy/Mode.htm.abstract: As-you-type search in realtime: every keystroke immediately triggers a request.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy/Mode.htm.name: Throttled
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy/Mode.htm.abstract: As-you-type search with throttling: requests are slightly delayed and merged if necessary, to avoid spawning

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy/Mode.htm.name: Manual
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy/Mode.htm.abstract: Search has to be explicitly triggered by the user.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.name: throttleDelay
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Current throttle delay. This is dynamically adjusted from the observed response time.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.name: windowSize
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Maximum number of requests from the statistics that will be considered.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.name: throttleThreshold
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Threshold beyond which throttled mode is activated.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.name: manualThreshold
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Threshold beyond which manual mode is activated.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.name: stats
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Response time statistics used to decide between strategies.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.name: init(stats:)
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Construct a new strategy using the specified statistics.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.name: performSearch(from:userInfo:with:)
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Perform a search on behalf of a searcher.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.name: ModeSwitchNotification
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Notification posted when the mode has been updated.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.name: DropNotification
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html#/s:.abstract: Notification posted when a request is dropped (only occurs in Manual strategy).

Protocols/RequestStrategy.html#/s:FP17In.name: performSearch(from:userInfo:with:)
Protocols/RequestStrategy.html#/s:FP17In.abstract: Ask the strategy to perform a search.

Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html.name: AdaptiveNetworkStrategy
Classes/AdaptiveNetworkStrategy.html.abstract: Request strategy that adapts to the current network conditions.

Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html.name: ResponseTimeStats
Classes/ResponseTimeStats.html.abstract: Gathers response time statistics from one or more searchers.

Classes/FacetValue.html#/s:ZFC17InstantS.name: listFrom(facetCounts:refinements:)
Classes/FacetValue.html#/s:ZFC17InstantS.abstract: Convert unordered facet counts into an ordered list of facet values, supplementing any missing counts

Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: nbTypos
Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Number of typos encountered when matching the record.

Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: firstMatchedWord
Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Position of the most important matched attribute in the attributes to index list.

Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: proximityDistance
Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: When the query contains more than one word, the sum of the distances between matched words.

Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: userScore
Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Custom ranking for the object, expressed as a single numerical value.

Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: geoDistance
Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Distance between the geo location in the search query and the best matching geo location in the record, divided

Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: geoPrecision
Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Precision used when computed the geo distance, in meters.

Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.name: words
Classes/RankingInfo.html#/s:vC17InstantS.abstract: Number of matched words, including prefixes and typos.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.name: disjunctiveFacets
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.abstract: Facets that will be treated as disjunctive (OR). By default, facets are conjunctive (AND).

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.name: processingTimeMS
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.abstract: Processing time of the last query (in ms).

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.name: message
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.abstract: Used to return warnings about the query. Should be nil most of the time.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.name: queryAfterRemoval
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.abstract: A markup text indicating which parts of the original query have been removed in order to retrieve a non-empty

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.name: serverUsed
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.abstract: Actual host name of the server that processed the request. (Our DNS supports automatic failover and load

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.name: parsedQuery
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.abstract: The query string that will be searched, after normalization.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.name: timeoutCounts
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.abstract: Whether a timeout was hit when computing the facet counts. When true, the counts will be interpolated

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.name: timeoutHits
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:vC17Instan.abstract: Whether a timeout was hit when retrieving the hits. When true, some results may be missing.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.name: init(content:disjunctiveFacets:)
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.abstract: Create search results from an initial response from the API.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.name: facets(name:)
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.abstract: Retrieve the facet values for a given facet.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.name: facetStats(name:)
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.abstract: Retrieve the statistics for a numerical facet.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.name: highlightResult(at:path:)
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.abstract: Get the highlight result for an attribute of a hit.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.name: snippetResult(at:path:)
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.abstract: Get the snippet result for an attribute of a hit.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.name: rankingInfo(at:)
Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:FC17Instan.abstract: Get the ranking information for a hit.

Classes/SearchResults.html#/s:ZFC17Insta.abstract: Retrieve the highlight result corresponding to an attribute inside the JSON representation of a hit.

Classes/FacetRefinement.html#/s:FC17Inst.abstract: Build a filter corresponding to this refinement.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:FC17InstantSear.abstract: Create a new searcher targeting the specified index.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:FC17InstantSear.name: addResultHandler(_:)
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:FC17InstantSear.abstract: Register a result handler with this searcher.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:FC17InstantSear.abstract: Search using the current settings, with empty search metadata.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:FC17InstantSear.abstract: Search for values of a given facet.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:vC17InstantSear.name: hasPendingRequests
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:vC17InstantSear.abstract: Indicates whether there are any pending requests.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: SearchNotification
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Notification sent when a request is sent through the API Client.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: ResultNotification
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Notification sent when a successful response is received from the API Client.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: resultNotificationResultsKey
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Key containing the search results in a ResultNotification.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: CancelNotification
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Notification sent when a request is cancelled by the searcher.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: ErrorNotification
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Notification sent when an erroneous response is received from the API Client.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: RefinementChangeNotification
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Notification sent when a numeric or facet refinement has been added, removed or updated.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: userInfoNumericRefinementChangeKey
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Key containing all the numeric refinements in a RefinementChangeNotification.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: userInfoFacetRefinementChangeKey
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Key containing all the facet refinements in a RefinementChangeNotification.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: userInfoSeqNoKey
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Key containing the request sequence number in a SearchNotification, ResultNotification, ErrorNotification

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: userInfoParamsKey
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Key containing the search query in a SearchNotification, ResultNotification or ErrorNotification.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: userInfoIsLoadingMoreKey
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: Key containing the isLoadingMore query in a SearchNotification, ResultNotification or ErrorNotification.

Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.name: userInfoIsFinalKey
Classes/Searcher.html#/s:ZvC17InstantSea.abstract: User info key indicating whether the search is final (as opposed to an as-you-type search).

Classes/SearchParameters.html.name: SearchParameters
Classes/SearchParameters.html.abstract: A high-level representation of a query’s filter.

Classes/HighlightResult.html.name: HighlightResult
Classes/HighlightResult.html.abstract: Highlight result for an attribute of a hit.

Classes/SnippetResult.html.name: SnippetResult
Classes/SnippetResult.html.abstract: Snippet result for an attribute of a hit.

Classes/FacetValue.html.name: FacetValue
Classes/FacetValue.html.abstract: A value of a given facet, together with its number of occurrences.
